warning: These are demonstration forecasts for portfolio purposes. The model uses Spatial K-Fold Cross-Validation to provide honest performance estimates, but predictions should be treated as exploratory analysis rather than validated forecasts.
assumptions: Housing market conditions remain similar to 2019-2023 trends
BeltLine development continues at projected pace
No major policy interventions (rent control, inclusionary zoning)
limitations: Spatial Cross-Validation yields conservative accuracy estimates (~15-20% lower than Random CV)
Model trained on UDP 2019 typology labels - may not capture post-pandemic shifts
Does not account for micro-scale neighborhood dynamics
BeltLine proximity is a dominant feature - model may underperform in areas far from transit corridors
Census tract boundaries may not align with perceived neighborhood boundaries
